long_description: Ready to join in the fun of big-wheel mountain biking? The Marin Bobcat Trail 29er hardtail mountain bike offers great trail performance for both beginners and experienced riders at a great value. Light and sturdy 6061 aluminum frame boasts triple-butted top and down tubes for strength; double-butted chainstays and seatstays are shaped to maximize efficiency. SR Suntour XCR 29er LO-R Air suspension fork features 100mm of travel with adjustable rebound damping, hydraulic lockout, air-sprung preload and a tapered aluminum steerer. 27 gear combinations make easy work of spinning up mountains and flying down flowing trails. Shimano Acera shifters and front derailleur plus the Deore Shadow rear derailleur offer easy, responsive shifting. Shimano M395 hydraulic disc brakes deliver powerful, controlled deceleration on any terrain, in any weather, thanks to a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm in the back. Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires offer a fast-rolling center tread with corner-biting sides. Specs on the Marin Bobcat Trail 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
